trans-unit.source: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.
A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException"></xref> class.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException"></xref> class using the error message.
The reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException"></xref> class with serialized data.
The information about the current exception.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException"></xref> class using the error message and the inner exception information.
An exception that is thrown as a result of a previous exception typically includes a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A> property.
The reason for the exception.
The exception that caused the current exception.

Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command and the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed passed as parameters.
The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.

Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, and the inner exception information.
The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
The exception that caused the current exception.

Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the error message that explains the reason for the current exception, and the inner exception information passed as parameters.
The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
The reason for the exception.
The exception that caused the current exception.
